main event: A white, balloon-like object with a white light was observed over the horizon at Eglin Air Force Base, Florida on August 28, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 minutes.
The object was described as round and balloon-like, with only a white light visible.
The object split into two, then went straight up and back down.
The object circled at an altitude of about 2,500 feet, exhibiting red and white lights on the second pass.
The sighting was observed by multiple military personnel, including the tower chief and base operations dispatchers.
sighted object: A white, balloon-like object with a white light
witnesses: Military personnel, including the tower chief and base operations dispatchers
photographs: No photographs present in the report
